FIND_MY_DEVICE_STATUS_BAR_ICON_EXPLANATI: Show the Location Services icon in the status bar when you are tracking this iPad from another device.
ACTIVE_EXPLANATION_ITEM: A purple location services icon will appear next to an item that has recently used your location.
GEOFENCE_EXPLANATION_ITEM:
An outlined location services icon will appear next to an item that is using a geofence.

A geofence is a virtual perimeter around a location. Apps like Reminders use geofencing to notify you when you arrive at, or leave, these locations.
CONFIRM_LOCATION_TITLE_IPOD: Location Services will be disabled for all apps, but your personalized Location Services settings for apps will be temporarily restored if you use Find My iPod to enable Lost Mode.
SYSTEM_SERVICES_STATUS_BAR_ICON_EXPLANAT: Show the Location Services icon in the status bar when the services above request your location.
CORE_ROUTINE_EXPLANATION_IPHONE: Allow your iPhone to learn places you frequently visit in order to provide useful location-related information.
FIND_MY_DEVICE_EXPLANATION_IPOD: Find My iPod allows you to locate this iPod on a map, send it messages, and remotely lock or erase it.
CORE_ROUTINE_EXPLANATION_IPOD: Allow your iPod to learn places you frequently visit in order to provide useful location-related information.
DISABLED_WARNING_WIFI: Using Location Services requires turning on Wi-Fi.
REMOVE_ACCOUNT_IPOD:
Enter your Apple ID password to turn off Find My iPod and remove this iPod from your account.

%@
REMOVE_ACCOUNT_IPAD:
Enter your Apple ID password to turn off Find My iPad and remove this iPad from your account.

%@
DISABLED_WARNING_WLAN: Using Location Services requires turning on WLAN.
DESCRIPTION_WIFI: Location Services uses GPS along with crowd-sourced Wi-Fi hotspot and cell tower locations to determine your approximate location.

FIND_MY_DEVICE_EXPLANATION_IPHONE: Find My iPhone allows you to locate this iPhone on a map, send it messages, and remotely lock or erase it.

DESCRIPTION_NO_LOCAL_NETWORKING: Location Services uses GPS along with crowd-sourced cell tower locations to determine your approximate location.
REMOVE_ACCOUNT_IPHONE:
Enter your Apple ID password to turn off Find My iPhone and remove this iPhone from your account.
